2 Samuel or 2 Kings__21.8__Of Michol: They were the sons of Merob, who was married to Hadrielbut they are here called the sons of Michol, because she adopted them, and brought them up as her own.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__21.19__Adeodatus the son of the Forrest: So it is rendered in the Latin Vulgate, by giving the interpretation of the Hebrew names, which are Elhanan the son of Jaare.
